posts.post_content:
For your examination is this 1887 N172 Old Judge Buck Ewing HOFer, pose 149-9, bat at ready at 45 degrees, facing forward.

The card is graded 1.5 SGC due to the writing on the reverse.  Certainly a candidate for the "buy the card, not the holder" philosophy.

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee76/seablaster/IMG_20170217_0010_zpsifgqfcdc.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i234.photobucket.com/albums/ee76/seablaster/IMG_20170217_0009_zpsyf3wkzh2.jpg[/IMG]
If the card is priced as marked ($5), does that include S/H?
